GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
RDMA/hfi1: Fix potential integer multiplication overflow errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 8858284dd74906fa00f04f0252c75df4893a7959, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 7724105686e718ac476a6ad3304fea2fbcfcffde. For more details please see the references link.
